from.description: The email address you would like the email to come from.

to.description: The email address(es) you would like the email to be sent to.

cc.description: The email address(es) you would like the email to be cc'd to.

bcc.description: The email address(es) you would like the email to be bcc'd to.

subject.description: The subject line you would like to include in the email.

body.description: A map with the configration for the body of the email.

html.description: The HTML you would like to send in the body of the email

text.description: Text for a plain text version of the email

timeoutSeconds.desciption: The maximum amount of time the process is allowed to take.
